name: SAARATHI SOCIETY
briefDescription: We started the Saarathi Society in the Year 2011-12 in Hirehandigol village of Gadag district in Karnataka state for providing skill trainings to unemployed youth for taking up self employment as well as wage employment in Computer, Tailoring, Beauty Parlour, Hand Embroidery, Dairy development, Agriculture, etc.  We believe that the up-gradation of Skill is help the improve the socio-economic condition of poor people. Hence, Saarathi for strengthening the Society.
